mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.DIVISION_CD , A.GR_NO , A.GR_NO || '_' || A.ITEM_INOUT_ID AS KEY_ID , A.GR_SEQ , A.IO_TYPE , A.IO_TYPE_NM , A.IO_DATE , A.ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_SPEC , A.GR_UNIT , A.GR_UNIT_NM , A.GR_QTY , A.CONVERSION_UNIT , A.CONVERSION_UNIT_NM , A.CONVERSION_UNIT_QTY , NVL(A.RETURN_QTY,0) AS RETURN_QTY , A.CONVERSION_UNIT_QTY - NVL(A.RETURN_QTY, 0) AS REMAIN_QTY , 0 AS RETURN_REQUEST_QTY , A.UNIT_PRICE , A.AMOUNT , A.LOCAL_AMOUNT , A.CURRENCY_CD , A.CURRENCY_NM , A.EXCHANGE_RATE , A.VENDOR_CD , A.VENDOR_NM , A.GR_LOCATION_CD , A.GR_LOCATION_NM , A.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID , A.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , A.ITEM_TYPE , A.ITEM_TYPE_NM , A.ITEM_INOUT_ID FROM (SELECT MII.COMPANY_CD , MII.DIVISION_CD , MII.ITEM_INOUT_NO AS GR_NO , MII.ITEM_INOUT_SEQ AS GR_SEQ , MII.IO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_IO_TYPE_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD, MII.DIVISION_CD, MII.IO_TYPE) FROM DUAL) AS IO_TYPE_NM , MII.IO_DATE , MII.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MI.ITEM_SPEC , MII.UNIT AS GR_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD, MII.DIVISION_CD, MII.UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS GR_UNIT_NM , MII.QTY AS GR_QTY , MII.INOUT_UNIT AS CONVERSION_UNIT , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD, MII.DIVISION_CD, MII.INOUT_UNIT) FROM DUAL) AS CONVERSION_UNIT_NM , MII.INOUT_QTY AS CONVERSION_UNIT_QTY , (SELECT SUM(NVL(MPD.CONFIRM_QTY, MPD.INOUT_QTY)) FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPD WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MII.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MII.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID = MII.ITEM_INOUT_ID) AS RETURN_QTY , MII.UNIT_PRICE , MII.AMOUNT , MII.LOCAL_AMOUNT , MII.CURRENCY_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD, MII.DIVISION_CD, 'SM0017', MII.CURRENCY_CD, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS CURRENCY_NM , MII.EXCHANGE_RATE , MII.PARTNER_CD AS VENDOR_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PARTNER_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD,MII.DIVISION_CD,MII.PARTNER_CD) FROM DUAL) AS VENDOR_NM , MII.LOCATION_CD AS GR_LOCATION_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCATION_NAME(MII.COMPANY_CD,MII.DIVISION_CD,MII.LOCATION_CD) FROM DUAL) AS GR_LOCATION_NM , (SELECT MPD.PURCHASE_ORDER_ID FROM MOM_PURCHASE_INOUT_DTL MPD WHERE MPD.COMPANY_CD = MII.COMPANY_CD AND MPD.DIVISION_CD = MII.DIVISION_CD AND MPD.PURCHASE_INOUT_ID = MII.ITEM_ORDER_ID) AS PURCHASE_ORDER_ID , MII.ITEM_ORDER_ID AS PURCHASE_INOUT_ID , MI.ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MI.COMPANY_CD, MI.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MI.ITEM_TYPE, 'KR') FROM DUAL) AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , MII.ITEM_INOUT_ID FROM MOM_ITEM_INOUT MII , MOM_ITEM MI WHERE MII.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MII.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MII.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MII.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MII.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MII.IO_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{grDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{grDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 AND MII.PARTNER_CD = #{vendorCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MII.CURRENCY_CD = #{currencyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MII.IO_CATEGORY = 'I' AND MII.IO_TYPE IN ( SELECT MIC.IO_TYPE FROM MOM_IO_CATEGORY MIC WHERE MIC.COMPANY_CD = MII.COMPANY_CD AND MIC.DIVISION_CD = MII.DIVISION_CD AND MIC.PUR_RECEIVE_YN = 'Y' AND MIC.USE_YN = 'Y' ) ) A WHERE A.GR_QTY - NVL(A.RETURN_QTY,0) > 0 ORDER BY A.GR_NO , A.GR_SEQ
